700711f-a.title: Bronx: Castle Hill Avenue - Norton Avenue
700711f-a.text:
Castle Hill Avenue, north from Norton Avenue, showing a
W.P.A. highway nroject.
May 11, 1937

700711f-a.folder: Castle Hill Avenue & Norton Avenue, Bronx, NY

700712f-a.title: Bronx: Castle Hill Avenue - Norton Avenue
700712f-a.text:
Castle Hill Avenue, east side, north of Norton A.venue,
showing part of the house and the estate of John Screven
stretching out toward Westchester Creek and the East River.
Screven inherited the property from his father-in-law Gouverneur
Morris Wilkins.
Between 1900 and 1913
MAY BE REPRODUCED
700712f-a.folder: Castle Hill Avenue & Norton Avenue, Bronx, NY

700713f-a.title: Bronx: Castle Hill Avenue - Norton Avenue
700713f-a.text:
Castle Hill Ave., east side, north of Norton Ave., showing the
John Screven (also spelled Screvin) Mansion. It originally belonged
to Gouverneur Morris Wilkins and later to his son-in-law 4dut Screven,
after whom the area is familiarly known as Screven's Point.
Between 1909 and 1913.
MAY BE REPRODUCED
V
